text: Caño Grande Airport is an airport serving one of the many oil production facilities in the Casanare Department of Colombia. The nearest population center is Santa Rosalía, east of the runway. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Caño Grande *FallingRain - Caño Grande Airport Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Caño Grande Airport
